info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Mecklenburg, southeastern Lunenburg and west central Brunswick Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brodnax, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Hill, Lawrenceville, Brodnax, Dundas, Bacons Fork, Cochran, Gills Corner, Meredithville, Forksville and Prices Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
